indra#syaq vajrO#&siq vArtra#GnaqstvayAq&yaM ~MvRuqtraM ~Mva#ddhyAn miqtrAvaru#NayOstvA praSAqstrOH praqSiShA# yunajmi yaqj~jasyaq yOgE#naq viShNOqH kramO#&siq viShNO$H krAqntama#siq viShNOqrvikrA$ntamasi maqrutA$M 
prasaqvE jE#ShamAqptaM manaqH samaqhami#ndriqyENa# vIqryE#Na paSUqnAM maqnyura#siq tavE#va mE maqnyurBU#yAqnnamO# mAqtrE pRu#thiqvyai mAhaM mAqtara#M pRuthiqvI(gm) hi(gm)#siShaqM mA - [  ] 29
